samples.command: fw_printenv -n mfg (只要不是1下次開機就會是一般模式)

samples.description:
5G LED Red On  
5G LED Green On
5G LED Amber On
5G LED off

Status LED Red On
Status LED Green On
Status LED Amber On
Status LED off

ALL On	(不含Ethernet LED)
All off	(不含Ethernet LED)

samples.command: iwconfig wlan0 | grep ESSID | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d '"'

samples.description: Use ADB command to upgrade FW

samples.Note::
原始資料來源為"fw_setenv pega_model XXX"所設定的值
預期為產線所輸入
但MU310-Q612這種代表的應該是Pega自己的project name與料號
Q612 代表所使用的 5G module sku 為為 RG520N-EBDK
Q611 代表所使用的 5G module sku 為為 RG520N-GTAA
此值是否等同於HW PCB的版本 需要再確認.

當下的link rate, 若要看所有支援的速度請用:
ethtool eth0, 查看"Supported link modes:"項目.

samples.example:
PING 8.8.8.8 (8.8.8.8) 56(84) bytes of data.
64 bytes from 8.8.8.8: icmp_seq=1 ttl=115 time=176 ms

samples.command:
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:blue/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:blue/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:green/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:green/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:red/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/signal\:red/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:red/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:red/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:blue/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:blue/brightness
echo 255 > /sys/class/leds/status\:green/brightness
echo 0 > /sys/class/leds/status\:green/brightness

systemctl stop pu_resetBtn_monitor.service
touch /tmp/MFG
/usr/sbin/pu_resetBtn_monitor &

cat /tmp/reset_button
按下Reset button 10 秒後放開
samples.example:
Pressed RESET button over 10 seconds, do factory default action!
cat /tmp/reset_button    Get 1 or 0
samples.Note::
單純驗證Reset button 是否有被按下
用ctrl-C中斷執行

samples.command:
rm -f /tmp/MFG
systemctl restart pu_resetBtn_monitor.service
按下Reset button 10 秒後放開

samples.Purpose: 1) read SN of a single lens in EEPROM

samples.command:
amixer -c 0 get 'DMIC1 Gain'
amixer -c 0 get 'DMIC2 Gain'
amixer -c 0 get 'DMIC3 Gain'
amixer -c 0 get 'DMIC4 Gain'
samples.Note:
1. Set Gain = 0 to disabel each DMIC, for example disable DMIC0:
     amixer -c 0 set 'DMIC1 Gain' 0
2. <Gain>: range 0 ~ 255

samples.description: record sound for DMIC1~4 to specific filepath in PC
samples.Note: The record sound file in PC is not supported

samples.description: record sound for DMIC1~4 on VALO360
samples.Purpose: record a file that include 4 DMICs sound
samples.Note:
The dmic4.wav can be playing on VALO360 device. The following command:
aplay -Dhw:0,1 dmic4.wav

samples.description: recording and playing at the same time
samples.Purpose: recording DMICs and playing the sound from speaker

samples.description: play sound from specific filepath in PC with speaker
play sound from specific filepath in VALO360 with speaker

Tx  :  Run iperf client to send TCP packet.
Rx :  Run iperf server to receive TCP packet.
samples.Note: iperf is support,  standard iperf usage

samples.description: Scan a SSID and report if SSID is exist.
samples.Uart Message:
root@Valo360:/root$ wl scan -s CCTEST
wl: Busy
